newsitem.title: USA: StarSight files arbitration vs General.
newsitem.headline: StarSight files arbitration vs General.

text.p: StarSight Telecast Inc said Tuesday that it had filed an arbitration demand against General Instrument Corp to settle a dispute over a pact between the two to develop set-top boxes.

StarSight, which recently merged with Gemstar International Group Ltd, said in a statement that it is seeking "a permanent injunction, significant monetary damages and other relief in the arbitration."

It said General Instrument violated a licensing pact under which it agreed to develop and make a StarSight IPG-equipped set-top box. A call to General Instrument's offices in Chicago Tuesday evening was not immediately returned.
Starsight said it filed its arbitration demand with the American Arbitration Association in San Francisco.
